resources.string: Welcome to the Monty Hall Game! Behind each of these doors there is a prize you can take home. However, Only one prize is valuable, while the others two prizes are donkeys. Which door do you think the cash prize is located behind.
You have selected door selectedDoorIndex. Lets make things interesting! I will now remove one of the doors where a donkey is located.

Door index has been eliminated. I bet you think you made the right decision now. Or do you? Would you like to switch doors? You can if you want. Or do you want to stick with your gut and stay with your first pick. Which door would you like as your final selection?
You have decided that your final door will be door selectedDoorIndex. How Exciting! Now for the moment we have all been waiting for, the results.
Congratulations! You selected the door with a load of cash! Do you want to play again?
Sorry! Unfortunately you selected a door with a donkey. Do you want to play again?
